job_title: Branch Accountant (For Amra Kaj Kory (AKK)) - Job ID : 1462322
job_description: Amra Kaj Kory (AKK) is looking for Branch AccountantJob Description / Responsibilityআমরা কাজ করি (একেকে) একটি বেসরকারী ও উন্নয়নমূলক সংস্থা। মাইক্রোক্রেডিট রেগুলেটরী অথরিটি (এমআরএ) কর্তৃক সনদপ্রাপ্ত, সনদ নং ০১৬১৩-০১০৮১-০০৬৬১ এবং পিকেএসএফ এর সহযোগী সংস্থা। সংস্থা যে সকল উন্নয়নমূলক কার্যক্রম বাস্তবায়ন করছে তার মধ্যে ক্ষুদ্রঋণ কার্যক্রম অন্যতম। পিকেএসএফ এর আর্থিক সহায়তায় পরিচালিত ক্ষুদ্রঋণ কার্যক্রমে নিম্নোক্ত পদে দরখাস্ত আহবান করা যাচ্ছে:-Educational RequirementsBachelor of Commerce (BCom) in AccountingMaster of Commerce (MCom) in Accountingহিসাববিজ্ঞান, ব্যবস্থাপনা, মার্কেটিং ও ফিন্যান্স বিষয়ে স্নাতক/স্নাতকোত্তর ডিগ্রী থাকতে হবে।Experience RequirementsAt least 4 year(s)The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): NGO,Development AgencyAdditional Requirementsপিকেএসএফ এর অর্থায়নে পরিচালিত ক্ষুদ্রঋণ কার্যক্রমে সংশ্লিষ্ট পদে কমপক্ষে ৪ বছরের কাজের অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে।MS Office email, online software, internet browsing সম্পর্কে অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে।Datasoft System Limited Bangladesh এর microfin360.com software browsing সম্পর্কে অভিজ্ঞতা থাকলে অগ্রাধিকার দেওয়া হবে।Job LocationFaridpurSalaryTk. 28000 (Monthly)

job_title: Tax & Bookkeeping Intern (Remote) - For SNF Accounting Canada - Job ID: 1462773
job_description: SNF Accounting Canada is looking for Tax & Bookkeeping Intern (Remote)Job Description / ResponsibilityAbout the Role:We are a growing Canadian accounting firm seeking a motivated accounting professional to join our team. This is an excellent opportunity to build your career while gaining valuable Canadian corporate experience that will strengthen your profile for future immigration to Canada.Responsibilities:Prepare personal and corporate tax returns for Canadian clientsPerform bookkeeping, account reconciliation, and bank reconciliationsCompile and prepare financial statements for various Canadian-based clientsSupport ongoing client accounting needs throughout the yearAssist with month-end and year-end financial processesEmployment StatusInternWorkplaceWork from homeEducational RequirementsBachelor of Commerce (BCom) in AccountingBachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in AccountingACCA, CMA, CPASkills Required: VAT, Income Tax, Bookkeeping, Quickbook OnlineExperience Requirements1 to 5 year(s)The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):Consulting Firms,Audit Firms /Tax ConsultantFreshers are also encouraged to apply.Additional RequirementsMinimum 3–6 months of experience in accounting, bookkeeping, or taxAccounting degree completed or in progressCandidates pursuing ACCA, ACA, CMA or similar professional qualifications preferredStrong attention to detail and willingness to learnComfortable using cloud-based accounting tools (QuickBooks experience is an asset)Own computer and reliable internet connection requiredJob LocationAnywhere in BangladeshSalaryTk. 5000 (Monthly)

job_description: ASSK AMARI WAY DEVELOPERS LTD is looking for AccountantJob Description / ResponsibilityMaintain and manage company accounts with accuracy and confidentiality.Handle tax-related matters, including preparation and submission of returns.Assist in both internal and external audits.Prepare financial statements, vouchers and relevant supporting documents.Ensure compliance with company policies and applicable regulatory requirements.Good analytical ability and strong documentation skills.Honest, sincere and capable of working under guidance and meeting deadlines.Educational RequirementsBachelor/HonorsSkills Required: Cash Management, Accounting, CA CC, VAT and Tax, Income TaxExperience RequirementsAt least 2 year(s)The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):Real EstateAdditional RequirementsStrong knowledge of VAT, Tax and financial reportingProficiency in accounting software and MS Office applications.• Good analytical ability and strong documentation skills.Minimum 2+ years of practical experience in company accounts, taxation and audit.Strong knowledge of VAT, Tax and financial reporting.Proficiency in accounting software and MS Office applications.Job LocationDhaka (GULSHAN 1)

job_title: Senior Quality Controller - For Onetex Limited (Bangladesh) - Job ID: 1461221
job_description: Onetex Limited (Bangladesh) is looking for Senior Quality ControllerJob Description / ResponsibilityExplore a dynamic and enduring career with Onetex Limited (Bangladesh)'s Liaison Office!We are currently seeking individuals interested in a long-term, challenging, and rewarding career. Join our expanding family and seize the opportunity to build an inspired career you can truly take pride in.We are actively recruiting for the Senior Quality Controller (Knit & Woven) position at our Bangladesh Office. If you're passionate about your work and ready to embrace a role that blends challenge with reward, we invite you to consider joining us.Responsible for sample making & checking (fit, materials, constructions & functionality) from development to size set to PP samples for the garment.Monitor product quality across all production stages.Ensure that garments are produced in accordance with the defined quality standards and the Tech Pack.Educating factories in improving sample execution and get right first-time quality from each process.Proactively follow up with factories on the status of various samples and ensure timely submission in accordance with defined quality standards.Screen for potential problems at the production stage and work closely with the merchandising team to troubleshoot.Regularly submit in-line inspection reports, along with other production reports, to the merchandising team.Ensures production is transparent and relevant data is made available at all time.Regularly submit production report / exact production planning with merchandising team.Maintain effective communication with sourcing team, merchandising team and corporate compliance team.Ensure Smart handling & knowledge of 3rd-party testing & FRI procedures.Regularly maintain the factory QA standard operation procedure.Educational RequirementsBachelor/HonorsBachelor's Degree in related field from a reputed institute.Skills Required: Quality Control Audit/ Inspect, Garment Technology, Quality assurance and control, Sample Technical, Sample DevelopmentExperience RequirementsAt least 10 year(s)The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):Garments,Buying HouseAdditional RequirementsMust have experience in LIDL operations.Self-motivating and decision maker.At least 10 years of hands-on working experience in quality assurance and familiarity with QC standards and procedures, with any reputed multinational Buying/Sourcing/ Liaison Office/Factory.Good knowledge in fabric, sewing, garment fitting, pattern making and garment production.Attention to detail and strong organisational, coordination, and planning skills.Team player with good interpersonal & communication skills.Able to work independently, self-motivated, responsible, well-organized and willing to learn.Exceptional multitasking skills and the ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced and creative environment.Good written and verbal communication skills in both Bangla and English.Proactive and dynamic approach with the ability to work efficiently under high pressure and workload.Job LocationDhaka
